title: ERISA compliance and audit reports
dataVerified: Plan actuary name, plan sponsor, compliance status, funding requirements, plan year
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Link to DOL system (plan administrators and DOL auditors, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fabricated ERISA compliance reports. Domain binding verifies enrolled actuary (EA) credentials. DOL/IRS audit trail for employee benefit plans. Multi-billion dollar pension plans. Participant protection under ERISA. Criminal penalties for false statements to DOL. Critical for qualified plans where ERISA compliance is legally mandated.
